translated: They do not form mental constructs or concepts about the correct understandings being empty or not empty.üîΩThey do not form mental constructs or concepts about the correct understandings having signs or being signless.

original: so so yang dag par rig pa rnams smon pa yod ces bya ba dang / smon pa med ces bya bar yongs su mi rtog go /
analyzed: so so yang dag par rig pa rnams smon pa yod ces bya ba dang / smon pa med ces bya bar yongs su mi rtog go /
translated: They do not form mental constructs or concepts about the correct understandings having aspirations or being without aspirations.

original: so so yang dag par rig pa rnams zhi zhes bya ba dang / ma zhi zhes bya bar yongs su mi rtog go /
analyzed: so so yang dag par rig pa rnams zhi zhes bya ba dang / ma zhi zhes bya bar yongs su mi rtog go /
translated: They do not form mental constructs or concepts about the detailed and thorough knowledges, thinking that they are calm or not calm.

original: so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dben zhes bya ba dang / mi dben zhes bya bar yongs su mi rtog go /
analyzed: so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dben zhes bya ba dang / mi dben zhes bya bar yongs su mi rtog go /
translated: They do not form mental constructs or concepts about the detailed and thorough knowledges, thinking that they are void or not void.

original: byams pa chen po rtag ces bya ba dang / mi rtag ces bya bar yongs su mi rtog go /
analyzed: byams pa chen po rtag ces bya ba dang / mi rtag ces bya bar yongs su mi rtog go /
translated: They do not form mental constructs or concepts about great love, thinking that it is eternal or that it is not eternal.

original: byams pa chen po bde zhes bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya bar yongs su mi rtog go /
analyzed: byams pa chen po bde zhes bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya bar yongs su mi rtog go /
translated: They do not form mental constructs or concepts about great love, thinking that it is happiness or that it is suffering.

original: byams pa chen po bdag ces bya ba dang / bdag med ces bya bar yongs su mi rtog go /
analyzed: byams pa chen po bdag ces bya ba dang / bdag med ces bya bar yongs su mi rtog go /
translated: They do not form mental constructs or concepts about great love, thinking that it is a self or that it is not a self.

original: byams pa chen po sdug ces bya ba dang / mi sdug ces bya bar yongs su mi rtog go /
analyzed: byams pa chen po sdug ces bya ba dang / mi sdug ces bya bar yongs su mi rtog go /
translated: They do not form mental constructs or concepts about great love, thinking that it is attractive or that it is unattractive.

original: byams pa chen po stong zhes bya ba dang / mi stong zhes bya bar yongs su mi rtog go /
analyzed: byams pa chen po stong zhes bya ba dang / mi stong zhes bya bar yongs su mi rtog go /
translated: They do not form mental constructs or concepts about great love, thinking that it is empty or that it is not empty.

original: byams pa chen po mtshan ma yod ces bya ba dang / mtshan ma med ces bya bar yongs su mi rtog go /
analyzed: byams pa chen po mtshan ma yod ces bya ba dang / mtshan ma med ces bya bar yongs su mi rtog go /
translated: They do not form mental constructs or concepts about great love in terms of whether it is with signs or signless.

original: byams pa chen po smon pa yod ces bya ba dang / smon pa med ces bya bar yongs su mi rtog go /üîΩbyams pa chen po zhi zhes bya ba dang / ma zhi zhes bya bar yongs su mi rtog go /
analyzed: byams pa chen po smon pa yod ces bya ba dang / smon pa med ces bya bar yongs su mi rtog go / byams pa chen po zhi zhes bya ba dang / ma zhi zhes bya bar yongs su mi rtog go /
translated: They do not form mental constructs or concepts about great love in terms of whether it is with wishes or wishless.üîΩThey do not form mental constructs or concepts about great love in terms of whether it is calm or not calm.

original: byams pa chen po dben zhes bya ba dang / mi dben zhes bya @257a *//üîΩbar yongs su mi rtog go /
analyzed: byams pa chen po dben zhes bya ba dang / mi dben zhes bya @257a *// bar yongs su mi rtog go /
translated: They do not form mental constructs or concepts about great love in terms of whether it is void or not void.

original: snying rje chen po rtag ces bya ba dang / mi rtag ces bya bar yongs su mi rtog go /
analyzed: snying rje chen po rtag ces bya ba dang / mi rtag ces bya bar yongs su mi rtog go /
translated: They do not form mental constructs or concepts about great compassion in terms of whether it is permanent or impermanent.

original: snying rje chen po bde zhes bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya bar yongs su mi rtog go /
analyzed: snying rje chen po bde zhes bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya bar yongs su mi rtog go /
translated: They do not form mental constructs or concepts about great compassion in terms of whether it is happiness or suffering.

original: snying rje chen po bdag ces bya ba dang / bdag med ces bya bar yongs su mi rtog go /
analyzed: snying rje chen po bdag ces bya ba dang / bdag med ces bya bar yongs su mi rtog go /
translated: They do not form mental constructs or concepts about great compassion in terms of whether it is a self or not a self.

original: snying rje chen po sdug ces bya ba dang / mi sdug ces bya bar yongs su mi rtog go /
analyzed: snying rje chen po sdug ces bya ba dang / mi sdug ces bya bar yongs su mi rtog go /
translated: They do not form mental constructs or concepts about great compassion in terms of whether it is attractive or unattractive.

original: snying rje chen po stong zhes bya ba dang / mi stong zhes bya bar yongs su mi rtog go /
analyzed: snying rje chen po stong zhes bya ba dang / mi stong zhes bya bar yongs su mi rtog go /
translated: They do not form mental constructs or concepts about great compassion in terms of whether it is empty or not empty.

original: snying rje chen po mtshan ma yod ces bya ba dang / mtshan ma med ces bya bar yongs su mi rtog go /
analyzed: snying rje chen po mtshan ma yod ces bya ba dang / mtshan ma med ces bya bar yongs su mi rtog go /
translated: They do not form mental constructs or concepts about great compassion in terms of whether it is with signs or signless.

original: snying rje chen po smon pa yod ces bya ba dang / smon pa med ces bya bar yongs su mi rtog go /
analyzed: snying rje chen po smon pa yod ces bya ba dang / smon pa med ces bya bar yongs su mi rtog go /
translated: They do not form mental constructs or concepts about great compassion in terms of whether it is with wishes or wishless.

original: snying rje chen po zhi zhes bya ba dang / ma zhi zhes bya bar yongs su mi rtog go /
analyzed: snying rje chen po zhi zhes bya ba dang / ma zhi zhes bya bar yongs su mi rtog go /
translated: They do not form mental constructs or concepts about great compassion in terms of whether it is calm or not calm.

original: snying rje chen po dben zhes bya ba dang / mi dben zhes bya bar yongs su mi rtog go /
analyzed: snying rje chen po dben zhes bya ba dang / mi dben zhes bya bar yongs su mi rtog go /
translated: They do not form mental constructs or concepts about great compassion in terms of whether it is void or not void.

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams rtag ces bya ba dang / mi rtag ces bya bar yongs su mi rtog go /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams rtag ces bya ba dang / mi rtag ces bya bar yongs su mi rtog go /
translated: They do not form mental constructs or concepts about the distinct attributes of the buddhas in terms of whether they are permanent or impermanent.

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams bde zhes bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya bar yongs su mi rtog go /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams bde zhes bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya bar yongs su mi rtog go /
translated: They do not form mental constructs or concepts about the distinct attributes of the buddhas in terms of whether they are imbued with happiness or suffering.

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams bdag ces bya ba dang / bdag med ces bya bar yongs su mi rtog go /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams bdag ces bya ba dang / bdag med ces bya bar yongs su mi rtog go /
translated: They do not form mental constructs or concepts about the distinct qualities of the Buddha, thinking of them as a self or a non-self.

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams sdug ces bya ba dang /mi sdug ces bya bar yongs su mi rtog go /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams sdug ces bya ba dang /mi sdug ces bya bar yongs su mi rtog go /
translated: They do not form mental constructs or concepts about the distinct qualities of the Buddha, thinking of them as attractive or unattractive.

original: sangs rgyas @257b kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams stong zhes bya ba dang / mi stong zhes bya bar yongs su mi rtog go /
analyzed: sangs rgyas @257b kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams stong zhes bya ba dang / mi stong zhes bya bar yongs su mi rtog go /
translated: They do not form mental constructs or concepts about the distinct qualities of the Buddha, thinking of them as empty or not empty.

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams mtshan ma yod ces bya ba dang / mtshan ma med ces bya bar yongs su mi rtog go /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams mtshan ma yod ces bya ba dang / mtshan ma med ces bya bar yongs su mi rtog go /
translated: They do not form mental constructs or concepts about the distinct qualities of the Buddha, thinking of them as with signs or signless.

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams smon pa yod ces bya ba dang / smon pa med ces bya bar yongs su mi rtog go /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams smon pa yod ces bya ba dang / smon pa med ces bya bar yongs su mi rtog go /
translated: They do not form mental constructs or concepts about the distinct qualities of the Buddha, thinking of them as having aspirations or lacking aspirations.

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams zhi zhes bya ba dang / ma zhi zhes bya bar yongs su mi rtog go /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams zhi zhes bya ba dang / ma zhi zhes bya bar yongs su mi rtog go /
translated: They do not form mental constructs or concepts about the distinct qualities of the Buddha, thinking of them as calm or not calm.

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams dben zhes bya ba dang / mi dben zhes bya bar yongs su mi rtog go /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams dben zhes bya ba dang / mi dben zhes bya bar yongs su mi rtog go /
translated: They do not fully conceptualize that the distinct attributes of a buddha are void or not void.

original: thams cad shes pa nyid rtag ces bya ba dang / mi rtag ces bya bar yongs su mi rtog go /
analyzed: thams cad shes pa nyid rtag ces bya ba dang / mi rtag ces bya bar yongs su mi rtog go /
translated: They do not fully conceptualize that the state of knowing all things is permanent or impermanent.

original: thams cad shes pa nyid bde zhes bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya bar yongs su mi rtog go /
analyzed: thams cad shes pa nyid bde zhes bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya bar yongs su mi rtog go /
translated: They do not fully conceptualize that the state of knowing all things is imbued with happiness or suffering.

original: thams cad shes pa nyid bdag ces bya ba dang / bdag med ces bya bar yongs su mi rtog go /
analyzed: thams cad shes pa nyid bdag ces bya ba dang / bdag med ces bya bar yongs su mi rtog go /
translated: They do not fully conceptualize that the state of knowing all things is a self or not a self.

original: thams cad shes pa nyid sdug ces bya ba dang / mi sdug ces bya bar yongs su mi rtog go /
analyzed: thams cad shes pa nyid sdug ces bya ba dang / mi sdug ces bya bar yongs su mi rtog go /
translated: They do not fully conceptualize that the state of knowing all things is attractive or unattractive.

original: thams cad shes pa nyid stong zhes bya ba dang / mi stong zhes bya bar yongs su mi rtog go /
analyzed: thams cad shes pa nyid stong zhes bya ba dang / mi stong zhes bya bar yongs su mi rtog go /
translated: They do not fully conceptualize that the state of knowing all things is empty or not empty.

original: thams cad shes pa nyid mtshan ma yod ces bya ba dang / mtshan ma med ces bya bar yongs su mi rtog go /
analyzed: thams cad shes pa nyid mtshan ma yod ces bya ba dang / mtshan ma med ces bya bar yongs su mi rtog go /
translated: They do not fully conceptualize that the state of knowing all things is with signs or signless.

original: thams cad shes pa nyid smon pa yod ces bya ba dang / smon pa med ces bya bar yongs su mi rtog go /
analyzed: thams cad shes pa nyid smon pa yod ces bya ba dang / smon pa med ces bya bar yongs su mi rtog go /
translated: They do not form mental constructs or concepts about the knowledge of all aspects being with wishes or being without wishes.üîΩThey do not form mental constructs or concepts about the knowledge of all aspects being calm or not being calm.

original: thams cad shes pa nyid zhi zhes bya ba dang / ma zhi zhes bya bar yongs su mi rtog go /üîΩthams cad shes pa nyid dben zhes bya @258a *//
analyzed: thams cad shes pa nyid zhi zhes bya ba dang / ma zhi zhes bya bar yongs su mi rtog go / thams cad shes pa nyid dben zhes bya @258a *//
translated: They do not form mental constructs or concepts about the knowledge of all aspects being void or not being void.

original: ba dang / mi dben zhes bya bar yongs su mi rtog go /
analyzed: ba dang / mi dben zhes bya bar yongs su mi rtog go /
translated: They do not form mental constructs or concepts about the knowledge of all aspects being sublime or not being sublime.

original: lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid rtag ces bya ba dang / mi rtag ces bya bar yongs su mi rtog go /
analyzed: lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid rtag ces bya ba dang / mi rtag ces bya bar yongs su mi rtog go /
translated: They do not form mental constructs or concepts about the knowledge of the aspects of the path being permanent or impermanent.

original: lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid bde zhes bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya bar yongs su mi rtog go /
analyzed: lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid bde zhes bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya bar yongs su mi rtog go /
translated: They do not form mental constructs or concepts about the knowledge of the aspects of the path being happiness or suffering.

original: lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid bdag ces bya ba dang / bdag med ces bya bar yongs su mi rtog go /
analyzed: lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid bdag ces bya ba dang / bdag med ces bya bar yongs su mi rtog go /
translated: They do not form mental constructs or concepts about the knowledge of the aspects of the path being a self or not being a self.

original: lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid sdug ces bya ba dang / mi sdug ces bya bar yongs su mi rtog go /
analyzed: lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid sdug ces bya ba dang / mi sdug ces bya bar yongs su mi rtog go /
translated: They do not form mental constructs or concepts about the knowledge of the aspects of the path being pleasant or unpleasant.

original: lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid stong zhes bya ba dang / mi stong zhes bya bar yongs su mi rtog go /üîΩlam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid mtshan ma yod ces bya ba dang / mtshan ma med ces bya bar yongs su mi rtog go /
analyzed: lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid stong zhes bya ba dang / mi stong zhes bya bar yongs su mi rtog go / lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid mtshan ma yod ces bya ba dang / mtshan ma med ces bya bar yongs su mi rtog go /
translated: They do not form mental constructs or concepts about the knowledge of the aspects of the path being empty or not empty.üîΩThey do not form mental constructs or concepts about the knowledge of the aspects of the path being with signs or signless.

original: lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid smon pa yod ces bya ba dang / smon pa med ces bya bar yongs su mi rtog go /üîΩlam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid zhi zhes bya ba dang / ma zhi zhes bya bar yongs su mi rtog go /
analyzed: lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid smon pa yod ces bya ba dang / smon pa med ces bya bar yongs su mi rtog go / lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid zhi zhes bya ba dang / ma zhi zhes bya bar yongs su mi rtog go /
translated: They do not form mental constructs or concepts about the knowledge of the aspects of the path being with wishes or wishless.üîΩThey do not form mental constructs or concepts about the knowledge of the aspects of the path being calm or not calm.

original: lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid dben zhes bya ba dang / mi dben zhes bya bar yongs su mi rtog go /
analyzed: lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid dben zhes bya ba dang / mi dben zhes bya bar yongs su mi rtog go /
translated: They do not form mental constructs or concepts about the knowledge of the aspects of the path being void or not void.

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rtag ces bya ba dang / mi rtag ces bya bar yongs su mi rtog go /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rtag ces bya ba dang / mi rtag ces bya bar yongs su mi rtog go /
translated: They do not form mental constructs or concepts about the knowledge of all aspects being permanent or impermanent.

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid bde zhes bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya bar yongs su mi rtog go /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid bde zhes bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya bar yongs su mi rtog go /
translated: They do not form mental constructs or concepts about the knowledge of all aspects being happiness or suffering.

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid bdag ces bya ba dang / bdag med ces bya bar yongs su mi rtog go /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid bdag ces bya ba dang / bdag med ces bya bar yongs su mi rtog go /
translated: They do not form mental constructs or concepts about the knowledge of all aspects, thinking that it has a self or that it is selfless.

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen @258b pa nyid sdug ces bya ba dang / mi sdug ces bya bar yongs su mi rtog go /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen @258b pa nyid sdug ces bya ba dang / mi sdug ces bya bar yongs su mi rtog go /
translated: They do not form mental constructs or concepts about the knowledge of all aspects, thinking that it is beautiful or that it is ugly.

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid stong zhes bya ba dang / mi stong zhes bya bar yongs su mi rtog go /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid stong zhes bya ba dang / mi stong zhes bya bar yongs su mi rtog go /
translated: They do not form mental constructs or concepts about the knowledge of all aspects, thinking that it is empty or that it is not empty.

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid mtshan ma yod ces bya ba dang / mtshan ma med ces bya ba yongs su mi rtog go /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid mtshan ma yod ces bya ba dang / mtshan ma med ces bya ba yongs su mi rtog go /
translated: They do not form mental constructs or concepts about the knowledge of all aspects, thinking that it has a defining mark or that it is without a defining mark.

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid smon pa yod ces bya ba dang / smon pa med ces bya bar yongs su mi rtog go /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid smon pa yod ces bya ba dang / smon pa med ces bya bar yongs su mi rtog go /
translated: They do not form mental constructs or concepts about the knowledge of all aspects, thinking that it has aspirations or that it is without aspirations.

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid zhi zhes bya ba dang / ma zhi zhes bya bar yongs su mi rtog go /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid zhi zhes bya ba dang / ma zhi zhes bya bar yongs su mi rtog go /
translated: They do not form mental constructs or concepts about the knowledge of all aspects, thinking that it is calm or that it is not calm.

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dben zhes bya ba dang / mi dben zhes bya bar yongs su mi rtog go /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dben zhes bya ba dang / mi dben zhes bya bar yongs su mi rtog go /

analyzed: ro'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni / ro ma yin / reg gi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni /

analyzed: chos ma yin zhes zer /

analyzed: rna ba'i rnam par shes pa ma yin / sna'i rnam par shes pa'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni / sna'i rnam par shes pa ma yin / lce'i rnam par shes pa'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni /
translated: the non-arising of ear consciousness is not ear consciousness,üîΩthe non-arising of nose consciousness is not nose consciousness,

analyzed: lce'i rnam par shes pa ma yin / lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i ma skyes pa gang yin @259b pa de ni /

analyzed: lus kyi rnam par shes pa ma yin /

original: yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni /

original: tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor /üîΩci'i phyir na /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor / ci'i phyir na /
translated: Venerable Subh≈´ti,

analyzed: sna'i 'dus te reg pa ma yin / lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni /

analyzed: lce'i 'dus te reg pa ma yin / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni /

analyzed: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa ma yin / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni /
translated: The non-arising of body contact is not body contact.

analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor /
translated: Venerable Subh≈´ti,

original: ci'i phyir na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir na /
translated: why is it so?

original: de skad du /üîΩmig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: de skad du / mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni /

original: mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ma yin /üîΩrna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ma yin / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni /

original: rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ma yin /üîΩsna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni /üîΩsna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ma yin /
analyzed: rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ma yin / sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni / sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ma yin /
translated: The non-arising of feeling conditioned by contact through the coming together of ear is not feeling conditioned by contact through the coming together of ear.üîΩThe non-arising of feeling conditioned by contact through the coming together of nose is not feeling conditioned by contact through the coming together of nose.

original: lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni /üîΩlce'i 'dus te reg @260a *//üîΩpa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ma yin /
analyzed: lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni / lce'i 'dus te reg @260a *// pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ma yin /
translated: The non-arising of feeling conditioned by contact through the coming together of tongue is not feeling conditioned by contact through the coming together of tongue.

original: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni /
translated: The non-arising of feeling conditioned by contact through the coming together of body is not feeling conditioned by contact through the coming together of body.

original: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ma yin /üîΩyid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ma yin / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni /
translated: It is not a feeling that arises from the condition of the coming together of body, sensory contact, and consciousness.

original: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ma yin zhes zer /
analyzed: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ma yin zhes zer /
translated: It is not a feeling that arises from the condition of the coming together of mind, sensory contact, and consciousness.

original: tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor /

original: ci'i phyir na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir na /

analyzed: de skad du / sa'i khams kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni /

analyzed: chu'i khams ma yin / me'i khams kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni /

original: me'i khams ma yin /üîΩrlung gi khams kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: me'i khams ma yin / rlung gi khams kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni /
translated: The non-arising of the fire element is not the fire element.

original: rlung gi khams ma yin /üîΩnam mkha'i khams kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: rlung gi khams ma yin / nam mkha'i khams kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni /
translated: The non-arising of the wind element is not the wind element.

original: nam mkha'i khams ma yin /üîΩrnam par shes pa'i khams kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: nam mkha'i khams ma yin / rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni /

analyzed: rnam par shes pa'i khams ma yin zhes zer /

analyzed: len pa ma yin /

analyzed: srid pa'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni /

analyzed: srid pa ma yin /

original: skye ba'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni /üîΩskye ba ma yin /üîΩrga shi'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: skye ba'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni / skye ba ma yin / rga shi'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni /

analyzed: rga shi ma yin zhes zer /
translated: The non-arising of aging and death is not aging and death.‚Äù

analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor /
translated: Venerable Subh≈´ti,

analyzed: ci'i phyir na /

original: de skad du /üîΩsbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: de skad du / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni /
translated: It is said:

original: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin /üîΩtshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni /
translated: The non-arising of the perfection of generosity is not the perfection of generosity.

original: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin /üîΩbzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni /
translated: The non-arising of the perfection of discipline is not the perfection of discipline.

original: bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin /üîΩbrtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni /
translated: The non-arising of the perfection of patience is not the perfection of patience.

original: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin /
analyzed: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin /
translated: The non-arising of the perfection of diligence is not the perfection of diligence.

original: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni /
translated: The non-arising of the perfection of concentration is not the perfection of concentration.

original: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin /üîΩshes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni /
translated: It is not the perfection of meditative stability.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin zhes zer /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin zhes zer /
translated: The non-arising of the perfection of wisdom is not the perfection of wisdom.

original: tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor /
translated: Venerable Subh≈´ti,

original: ci'i phyir na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir na /
translated: why is it so?

original: de skad du /üîΩnang stong pa nyid kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: de skad du / nang stong pa nyid kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni /
translated: It is said:

original: nang stong pa nyid ma yin /üîΩphyi stong pa nyid kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: nang stong pa nyid ma yin / phyi stong pa nyid kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni /
translated: The non-arising of inner emptiness is not inner emptiness.

original: phyi stong pa nyid ma yin /üîΩphyi @261a *// nang stong pa nyid kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: phyi stong pa nyid ma yin / phyi @261a *// nang stong pa nyid kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni /
translated: The non-arising of outer emptiness is not outer emptiness.

original: phyi nang stong pa nyid ma yin /üîΩstong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: phyi nang stong pa nyid ma yin / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni /
translated: The non-arising of inner and outer emptiness is not inner and outer emptiness.

original: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ma yin /
analyzed: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ma yin /
translated: The non-arising of the emptiness of emptiness is not the emptiness of emptiness.

original: chen po stong pa nyid ma yin /üîΩdon dam pa stong pa nyid kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: chen po stong pa nyid ma yin / don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni /
translated: The non-arising of great emptiness is not great emptiness.

original: don dam pa stong pa nyid ma yin /
analyzed: don dam pa stong pa nyid ma yin /
translated: The non-arising of the emptiness of ultimate reality is not the emptiness of ultimate reality.

original: 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni /
translated: The non-arising of the emptiness of the conditionedüîΩ

original: 'dus byas stong pa nyid ma yin /üîΩ'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: 'dus byas stong pa nyid ma yin / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni /
translated: The non-production of the emptiness of conditioned phenomena is not the emptiness of conditioned phenomena.

original: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ma yin /üîΩmtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ma yin / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni /
translated: The non-production of the emptiness of unconditioned phenomena is not the emptiness of unconditioned phenomena.

original: mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ma yin /üîΩthog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ma yin / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni /
translated: The non-production of the emptiness of beyond extremes is not the emptiness of beyond extremes.

original: thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid ma yin /üîΩdor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid ma yin / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni /
translated: The non-production of the emptiness of what is beginningless and endless is not the emptiness of what is beginningless and endless.

original: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid ma yin /üîΩrang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid ma yin / rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni /
translated: The non-production of the emptiness of what is not to be discarded is not the emptiness of what is not to be discarded.

original: rang bzhin stong pa nyid ma yin /
analyzed: rang bzhin stong pa nyid ma yin /
translated: The non-production of the emptiness of nature is not the emptiness of nature.

original: chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni /
translated: The non-production of the emptiness of all phenomena is not the emptiness of all phenomena.

original: chos thams cad stong pa nyid ma yin /üîΩrang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: chos thams cad stong pa nyid ma yin / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni /
translated: All phenomena are not emptiness.

original: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ma yin /üîΩmi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ma yin / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni /
translated: The nonarising of the emptiness of defining characteristics is not the emptiness of defining characteristics.

original: mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid ma yin /üîΩdngos po @261b med pa stong pa nyid kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid ma yin / dngos po @261b med pa stong pa nyid kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni /
translated: The nonarising of the emptiness of nonobservation is not the emptiness of nonobservation.

original: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid ma yin /üîΩngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid ma yin / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni /
translated: The nonarising of the emptiness of nonthings is not the emptiness of nonthings.

original: ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ma yin /üîΩdngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ma yin / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni /
translated: The nonarising of the emptiness of intrinsic nature is not the emptiness of intrinsic nature.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ma yin zhes zer /
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ma yin zhes zer /

analyzed: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams ma yin / dbang po rnams kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni /

analyzed: stobs rnams ma yin / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni /

original: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni /

analyzed: 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams ma yin / bsam gtan rnams kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni /

translated: The non-arising of the liberations is not the liberations.üîΩThe non-arising of the aspects of the correct and discerning awarenesses is not the aspects of the correct and discerning awarenesses.üîΩThe non-arising of the aspects of the powers is not the aspects of the powers.üîΩThe non-arising of the aspects of the branches of the path is not the aspects of the branches of the path.üîΩThe non-arising of the emptiness of emptiness is not the emptiness of emptiness.üîΩThe non-arising of the emptiness of great extent is not the emptiness of great extent.üîΩThe non-arising of the emptiness of ultimate reality is not the emptiness of ultimate reality.üîΩThe non-arising of the emptiness of the conditioned is not the emptiness of the conditioned.üîΩThe non-arising of the emptiness of the unconditioned is not the emptiness of the unconditioned.üîΩThe non-arising of the emptiness of what is beyond extremes is not the emptiness of what is beyond extremes.

original: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ma yin /
analyzed: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ma yin /
translated: The non-arising of the emptiness of the beginningless and endless is not the emptiness of the beginningless and endless.üîΩThe non-arising of the emptiness of nature is not the emptiness of nature.üîΩThe non-arising of the emptiness of all phenomena is not the emptiness of all phenomena.üîΩThe non-arising of the emptiness of intrinsic defining characteristics is not the emptiness of intrinsic defining characteristics.üîΩThe non-arising of the emptiness of nonobservation is not the emptiness of nonobservation.üîΩThe non-arising of the emptiness of nonentities is not the emptiness of nonentities.üîΩThe non-arising of the emptiness of essential nature is not the emptiness of essential nature.üîΩThe non-arising of the emptiness of other entities is not the emptiness of other entities.üîΩThe non-arising of the emptiness of the compounded is not the emptiness of the compounded.üîΩThe non-arising of the emptiness of the uncompounded is not the emptiness of the uncompounded.üîΩThe non-arising of the emptiness

analyzed: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni /

original: sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni /
translated: The decrease of the feeling that arises from the condition of the composite of nose

original: sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ma yin /
analyzed: sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ma yin /
translated: is not the feeling that arises from the condition of the composite of nose.

original: lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni /
translated: The decrease of the feeling that arises from the condition of the composite of tongueüîΩis not the feeling that arises from the condition of the composite of tongue.

original: lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ma yin /üîΩlus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ma yin / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni /
translated: the condition of contact through the union of tongue and taste is not a feeling conditioned by contact through the union of tongue and taste.

original: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ma yin /üîΩyid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ma yin / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni /
translated: The decrease of the condition of contact through the union of body and touch is notüîΩthe condition of contact through the union of body and touch.üîΩThe decrease of the condition of contact through the union of mind and mental phenomena is not

original: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ma yin /üîΩsa'i khams kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ma yin / sa'i khams kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni /
translated: the condition of contact through the union of mind and mental phenomena.üîΩThe decrease of the earth element is not

original: sa'i khams ma yin /üîΩchu'i khams kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: sa'i khams ma yin / chu'i khams kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni /
translated: the earth element.üîΩThe decrease of the water element is not

original: chu'i khams ma yin /üîΩme'i khams kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: chu'i khams ma yin / me'i khams kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni /
translated: the water element.üîΩThe decrease of the fire element is not

original: @276a *// me'i khams ma yin /üîΩrlung gi khams kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: @276a *// me'i khams ma yin / rlung gi khams kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni /
translated: the fire element.üîΩThe decrease of the wind element is not

original: rlung gi khams ma yin /üîΩnam mkha'i khams kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: rlung gi khams ma yin / nam mkha'i khams kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni /
translated: the wind element.üîΩThe decrease of the space element is not

original: nam mkha'i khams ma yin /
analyzed: nam mkha'i khams ma yin /
translated: the space element.

original: rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni /üîΩrnam par shes pa'i khams ma yin /üîΩma rig pa'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni / rnam par shes pa'i khams ma yin / ma rig pa'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni /
translated: The decrease of the consciousness element is not the consciousness element.

original: ma rig pa ma yin /üîΩ'du byed kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: ma rig pa ma yin / 'du byed kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni /
translated: The decrease of ignorance is not ignorance.

original: 'du byed ma yin /üîΩrnam par shes pa'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: 'du byed ma yin / rnam par shes pa'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni /
translated: The decrease of volitional factors is not volitional factors.

original: rnam par shes pa ma yin /üîΩming dang gzugs kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: rnam par shes pa ma yin / ming dang gzugs kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni /
translated: The decrease of consciousness is not consciousness.

original: ming dang gzugs ma yin /üîΩskye mched drug gi 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: ming dang gzugs ma yin / skye mched drug gi 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni /
translated: The decrease of name and form is not name and form.

original: skye mched drug ma yin /üîΩreg pa'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: skye mched drug ma yin / reg pa'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni /
translated: The decrease of the six sense spheres is not the six sense spheres.

original: reg pa ma yin /üîΩtshor ba'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: reg pa ma yin / tshor ba'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni /
translated: The decrease of contact is not contact.

original: tshor ba ma yin /üîΩsred pa'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: tshor ba ma yin / sred pa'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni /
translated: The decrease of feeling is not feeling.

original: sred pa ma yin /üîΩlen pa'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: sred pa ma yin / len pa'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni /
translated: The decrease of craving is not craving.

original: len pa ma yin /üîΩsrid pa'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: len pa ma yin / srid pa'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni /
translated: The decrease of appropriation is not appropriation.

original: srid pa ma yin /
analyzed: srid pa ma yin /
translated: The decrease of existence is not existence.

original: skye ba'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: skye ba'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni /
translated: The decrease of birth isüîΩ

original: skye ba ma yin /üîΩrga shi'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: skye ba ma yin / rga shi'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni /
translated: The decrease of birth is not birth.

original: rga shi ma yin /üîΩsbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: rga shi ma yin / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni /
translated: The decrease of aging and death is not aging and death.

original: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin /üîΩtshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni /
translated: The decrease of the perfection of giving is not the perfection of giving.

original: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin /üîΩbzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'grib @276b pa gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'grib @276b pa gang yin pa de ni /
translated: The decrease of the perfection of morality is not the perfection of morality.

original: bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin /üîΩbrtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni /
translated: The decrease of the perfection of patience is not the perfection of patience.

original: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin /üîΩbsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni /
translated: The decrease of the perfection of effort is not the perfection of effort.

original: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin /
analyzed: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin /
translated: The decrease of the perfection of meditation is not the perfection of meditation.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni /
translated: Whatever is the diminution of the perfection of wisdom,üîΩ

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin /üîΩnang stong pa nyid kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin / nang stong pa nyid kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni /
translated: Any diminution of the perfection of wisdom is not the perfection of wisdom.

original: nang stong pa nyid ma yin /üîΩphyi stong pa nyid kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: nang stong pa nyid ma yin / phyi stong pa nyid kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni /
translated: Any diminution of inner emptiness is not inner emptiness.

original: phyi stong pa nyid ma yin /üîΩphyi nang stong pa nyid kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: phyi stong pa nyid ma yin / phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni /
translated: Any diminution of outer emptiness is not outer emptiness.

original: phyi nang stong pa nyid ma yin /üîΩstong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: phyi nang stong pa nyid ma yin / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni /
translated: Any diminution of inner and outer emptiness is not inner and outer emptiness.

original: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ma yin /üîΩchen po stong pa nyid kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ma yin / chen po stong pa nyid kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni /
translated: Any diminution of the emptiness of emptiness is not the emptiness of emptiness.

original: chen po stong pa nyid ma yin /üîΩdon dam pa stong pa nyid kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: chen po stong pa nyid ma yin / don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni /
translated: Any diminution of great emptiness is not great emptiness.

original: don dam pa stong pa nyid ma yin /
analyzed: don dam pa stong pa nyid ma yin /
translated: Any diminution of the ultimate emptiness is not the ultimate emptiness.

original: 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni /
translated: Any diminution of conditioned emptiness is not conditioned emptiness.

original: 'dus byas stong pa nyid ma yin /
analyzed: 'dus byas stong pa nyid ma yin /
translated: It is not the emptiness of conditioned phenomena.

original: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni /
translated: The decrease of the emptiness of unconditioned phenomena

original: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ma yin /
analyzed: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ma yin /
translated: is not the emptiness of unconditioned phenomena.

original: mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni //
analyzed: mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni //
translated: The decrease of the emptiness of what transcends limits

original: mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ma yin /
analyzed: mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ma yin /
translated: is not the emptiness of what transcends limits.

original: thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni /
translated: The decrease of the emptiness of what is beginningless and endless

original: thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid ma yin /
analyzed: thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid ma yin /
translated: is not the emptiness of what is beginningless and endless.

original: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid @277a *//üîΩkyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid @277a *// kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni /
translated: The decrease of the emptiness of what is not to be discarded

original: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid ma yin /
analyzed: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid ma yin /
translated: is not the emptiness of what is not to be discarded.

original: rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni /
translated: The decrease of the emptiness of nature

original: rang bzhin stong pa nyid ma yin /
analyzed: rang bzhin stong pa nyid ma yin /
translated: is not the emptiness of nature.

original: chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni /
translated: The decrease of the emptiness of all phenomena

original: chos thams cad stong pa nyid ma yin /
analyzed: chos thams cad stong pa nyid ma yin /
translated: is not the emptiness of all phenomena.

original: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni /
translated: The diminution of the emptiness of defining characteristicsüîΩ

original: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ma yin /üîΩmi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ma yin / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni /
translated: The degeneration of the emptiness of defining characteristics is not the emptiness of defining characteristics.

original: mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid ma yin /üîΩdngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid ma yin / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni /
translated: The degeneration of the emptiness of nonobservation is not the emptiness of nonobservation.

original: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid ma yin /üîΩngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid ma yin / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni /
translated: The degeneration of the emptiness of nonthings is not the emptiness of nonthings.

original: ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ma yin /üîΩdngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ma yin / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni /
translated: The degeneration of the emptiness of intrinsic nature is not the emptiness of intrinsic nature.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ma yin /üîΩdran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ma yin / dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni /
translated: The degeneration of the emptiness of the intrinsic nature of nonthings is not the emptiness of the intrinsic nature of nonthings.

original: dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams ma yin /
analyzed: dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams ma yin /
translated: The degeneration of the applications of mindfulness is not the applications of mindfulness.

original: yang dag par spong ba rnams kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: yang dag par spong ba rnams kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni /
translated: The degeneration of the right efforts is not the right efforts.

original: yang dag par spong ba rnams ma yin /üîΩrdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: yang dag par spong ba rnams ma yin / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni /
translated: ‚ÄúThe degeneration of the correct exertions is not the correct exertions,

original: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams ma yin /üîΩdbang po rnams kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams ma yin / dbang po rnams kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni /
translated: ‚ÄúThe degeneration of the bases of supernatural powers is not the bases of supernatural powers,

original: dbang po rnams ma yin /üîΩstobs rnams kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: dbang po rnams ma yin / stobs rnams kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni /
translated: ‚ÄúThe degeneration of the faculties is not the faculties,

original: stobs rnams ma yin /üîΩbyang @277b chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: stobs rnams ma yin / byang @277b chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni /
translated: ‚ÄúThe degeneration of the powers is not the powers,

original: byang chub kyi yan lag rnams ma yin /üîΩ'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: byang chub kyi yan lag rnams ma yin / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni /
translated: ‚ÄúThe degeneration of the branches of awakening is not the branches of awakening,

original: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ma yin /üîΩ'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ma yin / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni /
translated: ‚ÄúThe degeneration of the noble eightfold path is not the noble eightfold path,

original: 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams ma yin /üîΩbsam gtan rnams kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams ma yin / bsam gtan rnams kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni /
translated: ‚ÄúThe degeneration of the truths is not the truths,

original: bsam gtan rnams ma yin /
analyzed: bsam gtan rnams ma yin /
translated: ‚ÄúThe degeneration of the concentrations is not the concentrations,

original: tshad med pa rnams kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: tshad med pa rnams kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni /
translated: ‚ÄúThe degeneration of the immeasurables is not the immeasurables,

original: tshad med pa rnams ma yin /
analyzed: tshad med pa rnams ma yin /
translated: it is not the immeasurables,

original: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni /

original: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ma yin /
analyzed: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ma yin /
translated: is not the formless absorptions.

original: rnam par thar pa rnams kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: rnam par thar pa rnams kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni /
translated: The decrease of the liberations

original: rnam par thar pa rnams ma yin /
analyzed: rnam par thar pa rnams ma yin /
translated: is not the liberations,

original: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni /
translated: and the decrease of the aspects of the liberated absorptions

original: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ma yin /
analyzed: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ma yin /
translated: is not the aspects of the liberated absorptions.üîΩThe decrease of the emptiness gate of liberation,

original: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni /
translated: signlessness, and aspirationlessnessüîΩis not the emptiness gate of liberation,

original: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa ma yin /
analyzed: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa ma yin /
translated: signlessness, and aspirationlessness.

original: mngon par shes pa rnams kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: mngon par shes pa rnams kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni /
translated: The decrease of the clairvoyances

original: mngon par shes pa rnams ma yin /
analyzed: mngon par shes pa rnams ma yin /
translated: is not the clairvoyances,

original: ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni /
translated: The degeneration of the meditative stabilizationsüîΩ

original: ting nge 'dzin rnams ma yin /üîΩgzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin rnams ma yin / gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni /
translated: The degeneration of the meditative stabilizations is not the meditative stabilizations.

original: gzungs @278a *// kyi sgo rnams ma yin /üîΩde bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: gzungs @278a *// kyi sgo rnams ma yin / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni /
translated: The degeneration of the dhƒÅra·πáƒ´ gateways is not the dhƒÅra·πáƒ´ gateways.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams ma yin /üîΩmi 'jigs pa rnams kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams ma yin / mi 'jigs pa rnams kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni /
translated: The degeneration of the powers of the tathƒÅgatas is not the powers of the tathƒÅgatas.

original: mi 'jigs pa rnams ma yin /üîΩso so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: mi 'jigs pa rnams ma yin / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni /
translated: The degeneration of the fearlessnesses is not the fearlessnesses.

original: so so yang dag par rig pa rnams ma yin /üîΩbyams pa chen po'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: so so yang dag par rig pa rnams ma yin / byams pa chen po'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni /
translated: The degeneration of the detailed and thorough knowledges is not the detailed and thorough knowledges.

original: byams pa chen po ma yin /üîΩsnying rje chen po'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: byams pa chen po ma yin / snying rje chen po'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni /
translated: The degeneration of great love is not great love.

original: snying rje chen po ma yin /
analyzed: snying rje chen po ma yin /
translated: The degeneration of great compassion is not great compassion.

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni /

translated: The dhƒÅra·πáƒ´ gateways, and the absence of duality, are all without attributes,

original: mi ldan pa'ang ma yin /
analyzed: mi ldan pa'ang ma yin /
translated: not subject to arising, and not something to be attained.üîΩThey are not existent, not nonexistent, not the same, not different, not visible, not invisible, not manifest, and not unmanifest.

original: gzugs med pa bltar med pa thogs pa med pa ste /üîΩ'di ltar mtshan nyid med par mtshan nyid gcig pa'o //
analyzed: gzugs med pa bltar med pa thogs pa med pa ste / 'di ltar mtshan nyid med par mtshan nyid gcig pa'o //
translated: They are not form, not feeling, not perception, not formation, and not consciousness.üîΩThey are not the eyes, not the ears, not the nose, not the tongue, not the body, and not the mind.üîΩThey are not form, not sound, not smell, not taste, not texture, and not mental objects.üîΩThey are not the earth element, not the water element, not the fire element, not the wind element, not the space element, and not the consciousness element.üîΩThey are not the perfection of generosity, not the perfection of discipline, not the perfection of patience, not the perfection of diligence, not the perfection of concentration, and not the perfection of insight.üîΩThey are not the applications of mindfulness, not the right efforts, not the legs of miraculous power, not the faculties, not the powers, not the branches of awakening, and not the path.üîΩThey are not the ten powers, not the fearlessnesses, not the detailed and thorough knowledges, not the distinct attributes of a buddha, and not the knowledge of all aspects.

original: 'grib pa gang yin pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams gang yin pa dang / gnyis su byar med pa gang yin pa dang / 'grib pa gang yin pa dang mi 'jigs pa rnams gang yin pa dang / gnyis su byar med pa gang yin pa dang /

translated: They are not the aggregates, not the constituents, not the sense fields, not the emptinesses, not the perfections, not the thirty-seven aspects of enlightenment, not the ten powers, not the fearlessnesses, not the detailed and thorough knowledges, not the distinct attributes of a buddha, and not the knowledge of all aspects.üîΩThey are not the path, not the result, not the Dharma, not the Sa·πÖgha, not nirvƒÅ·πáa, and not the unconditioned.üîΩThey are not the conditioned, not the unconditioned, not the past, not the future, and not the present.üîΩThey are not the world system of desire, not the world system of form, and not the world system of formlessness.üîΩThey are not the world system of desire, not the world system of form, and not the world system of formlessness.üîΩThey are not the world system of desire, not the world system of form, and not the world system of formlessness.üîΩThey are not the world system of desire, not the world system of form, and not the world

What is nonduality?üîΩWhat is the decline of the aspects of enlightenment? What are the aspects of enlightenment? What is nonduality? What is the decline of the thirty-seven dharmas on the side of awakening? What are the thirty-seven dharmas on the side of awakening? What is nonduality?üîΩWhat is the decline of the ten tathƒÅgata powers? What are the ten tathƒÅgata powers? What is nonduality? What is the decline of the four fearlessnesses? What are the four fearlessnesses? What is nonduality?üîΩWhat is the decline of the four detailed and thorough knowledges? What are the four detailed and thorough knowledges? What is nonduality? original: 'grib pa gang yin pa dang / snying rje chen po gang yin pa dang / gnyis su byar med pa gang yin pa dang / 'grib pa gang yin pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams gang yin pa dang / gnyis su byar med pa gang yin pa'i chos de dag thams cad kyang ldan pa'ang ma yin /üîΩmi ldan pa'ang ma yin /

original: gzugs med pa bltar med pa thogs pa med pa ste /
analyzed: gzugs med pa bltar med pa thogs pa med pa ste /

original: 'di ltar mtshan nyid med par mtshan nyid gcig pa'o //

original: lus kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de'ang lus ma yin /
analyzed: lus kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de'ang lus ma yin /

original: yid kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de'ang yid ma yin /
analyzed: yid kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de'ang yid ma yin /
translated: The decline of the mind is not the mind.

analyzed: gzugs kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de'ang gzugs ma @284b yin /

analyzed: sgra'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de'ang sgra ma yin / dri'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de'ang dri ma yin /

analyzed: ro'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de'ang ro ma yin /

original: reg gi 'grib pa gang yin pa de'ang reg ma yin /
analyzed: reg gi 'grib pa gang yin pa de'ang reg ma yin /

original: chos kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de'ang chos ma yin /
analyzed: chos kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de'ang chos ma yin /
translated: The degeneration of the Dharma is not the Dharma.

translated: The degeneration of eye consciousness is not eye consciousness.üîΩThe degeneration of ear consciousness is not ear consciousness.üîΩThe degeneration of nose consciousness is not nose consciousness.

original: lce'i rnam par shes pa'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de'ang lce'i rnam par shes pa ma yin /
analyzed: lce'i rnam par shes pa'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de'ang lce'i rnam par shes pa ma yin /

original: lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de'ang lus kyi rnam par shes pa ma yin /
analyzed: lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de'ang lus kyi rnam par shes pa ma yin /

original: yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de'ang yid kyi rnam par shes pa ma yin /
analyzed: yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de'ang yid kyi rnam par shes pa ma yin /

original: mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de'ang mig gi 'dus te reg pa ma yin //
analyzed: mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de'ang mig gi 'dus te reg pa ma yin //
translated: The degeneration of eye contact is not eye contact.

original: rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de'ang rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa ma yin /üîΩsna'i 'dus te reg pa'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de'ang sna'i 'dus te reg pa ma yin /
analyzed: rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de'ang rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa ma yin / sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de'ang sna'i 'dus te reg pa ma yin /

original: lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de'ang lce'i 'dus te reg pa ma yin /
analyzed: lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de'ang lce'i 'dus te reg pa ma yin /
translated: The decrease of the composite of tongue contact is not the composite of tongue contact.

original: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de'ang lus kyi 'dus te reg pa ma yin /
analyzed: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de'ang lus kyi 'dus te reg pa ma yin /
translated: The decrease of the composite of body contact is not the composite of body contact.

original: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de'ang yid kyi 'dus te reg pa ma @285a *//
analyzed: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de'ang yid kyi 'dus te reg pa ma @285a *//
translated: The decrease of the composite of mind contact is not the composite of mind contact.

original: yin / mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de'ang mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ma yin /
analyzed: yin / mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de'ang mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ma yin /
translated: The decrease of the feeling that arises from the condition of the composite of eye contact is not the feeling that arises from the condition of the composite of eye contact.

original: rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de'ang rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ma yin /
analyzed: rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de'ang rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ma yin /
translated: The decrease of the feeling that arises from the condition of the composite of ear contact is not the feeling that arises from the condition of the composite of ear contact.

original: sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de'ang sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ma yin /
analyzed: sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de'ang sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ma yin /
translated: The decrease of the feeling that arises from the condition of the union of nose and smell is not the feeling that arises from the condition of the union of nose and smell.

original: lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de'ang lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ma yin /
analyzed: lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de'ang lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ma yin /
translated: The decrease of the feeling that arises from the condition of the union of tongue and taste is not the feeling that arises from the condition of the union of tongue and taste.

original: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de'ang lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ma yin /
analyzed: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de'ang lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ma yin /
translated: The decrease of the feeling that arises from the condition of the union of body and touch is not the feeling that arises from the condition of the union of body and touch.

original: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de'ang yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ma yin /
analyzed: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de'ang yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ma yin /
translated: The decrease of the feeling that arises from the condition of the union of the mental faculty and its objects is not the feeling that arises from the condition of the union of the mental faculty and its objects.

original: sa'i khams kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de'ang sa'i khams ma yin /
analyzed: sa'i khams kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de'ang sa'i khams ma yin /
translated: The decrease of the earth element is not the earth element.

original: chu'i khams kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de'ang chu'i khams ma yin /
analyzed: chu'i khams kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de'ang chu'i khams ma yin /
translated: The decrease of the water element is not the water element.

original: me'i khams kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de'ang me'i khams ma yin /
analyzed: me'i khams kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de'ang me'i khams ma yin /
translated: The decrease of the fire element is not the fire element.

original: rlung gi khams kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de'ang rlung gi khams ma yin /
analyzed: rlung gi khams kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de'ang rlung gi khams ma yin /
translated: The decrease of the wind element is not the wind element.

original: nam mkha'i khams kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de'ang nam mkha'i khams ma yin /
analyzed: nam mkha'i khams kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de'ang nam mkha'i khams ma yin /
