original: rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de'ang rnam par shes @285b pa'i khams ma yin /
analyzed: rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de'ang rnam par shes @285b pa'i khams ma yin /
translated: The decrease of the consciousness element is not the consciousness element.

original: ma rig pa'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de'ang ma rig pa ma yin /
analyzed: ma rig pa'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de'ang ma rig pa ma yin /
translated: The decrease of ignorance is not ignorance.

original: 'du byed kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de'ang 'du byed ma yin /
analyzed: 'du byed kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de'ang 'du byed ma yin /
translated: The decrease of volitional factors is not volitional factors.

original: rnam par shes pa'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de'ang rnam par shes pa ma yin /
analyzed: rnam par shes pa'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de'ang rnam par shes pa ma yin /
translated: The decrease of consciousness is not consciousness.

original: ming dang gzugs kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de'ang ming dang gzugs ma yin /
analyzed: ming dang gzugs kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de'ang ming dang gzugs ma yin /
translated: The decrease of name and form is not name and form.

original: skye mched drug gi 'grib pa gang yin pa de'ang skye mched drug ma yin /
analyzed: skye mched drug gi 'grib pa gang yin pa de'ang skye mched drug ma yin /
translated: The decrease of the six sense sources is not the six sense sources.

original: reg pa'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de'ang reg pa ma yin /
analyzed: reg pa'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de'ang reg pa ma yin /
translated: The decrease of contact is not contact.

original: tshor ba'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de'ang tshor ba ma yin /
analyzed: tshor ba'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de'ang tshor ba ma yin /
translated: The decrease of feeling is not feeling.

original: sred pa'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de'ang sred pa ma yin /
analyzed: sred pa'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de'ang sred pa ma yin /
translated: The decrease in craving is not craving.

original: len pa'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de'ang len pa ma yin /üîΩsrid pa'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de'ang srid pa ma yin /
analyzed: len pa'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de'ang len pa ma yin / srid pa'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de'ang srid pa ma yin /
translated: The decrease in grasping is not grasping.üîΩThe decrease in becoming is not becoming.

original: skye ba'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de'ang skye ba ma yin /
analyzed: skye ba'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de'ang skye ba ma yin /
translated: The decrease in birth is not birth.

original: rga shi'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de'ang rga shi ma yin /
analyzed: rga shi'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de'ang rga shi ma yin /
translated: The decrease in aging and death is not aging and death.

original: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de'ang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin /
analyzed: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de'ang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin /
translated: The decrease in the perfection of generosity is not the perfection of generosity.

original: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de'ang tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin /
analyzed: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de'ang tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin /
translated: The decrease in the perfection of discipline is not the perfection of discipline.

original: bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de'ang bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin /
analyzed: bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de'ang bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin /
translated: The decrease in the perfection of patience is not the perfection of patience.

original: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de'ang brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin /
analyzed: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de'ang brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin /
translated: The decrease in the perfection of diligence is not the perfection of diligence.

original: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'grib pa gang yin pa @286a *//
analyzed: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'grib pa gang yin pa @286a *//
translated: The degeneration of the perfection of meditative concentration

original: de'ang bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin /
analyzed: de'ang bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin /
translated: is not the perfection of meditative concentration.üîΩThe degeneration of the perfection of wisdom

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin /
translated: is not the perfection of wisdom.üîΩThe degeneration of inner emptiness

original: nang stong pa nyid kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de'ang nang stong pa nyid ma yin /
analyzed: nang stong pa nyid kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de'ang nang stong pa nyid ma yin /
translated: is not inner emptiness.üîΩThe degeneration of outer emptiness

original: phyi stong pa nyid kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de'ang phyi stong pa nyid ma yin /
analyzed: phyi stong pa nyid kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de'ang phyi stong pa nyid ma yin /
translated: is not outer emptiness.üîΩThe degeneration of inner and outer emptiness

original: phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de'ang phyi nang stong pa nyid ma yin /
analyzed: phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de'ang phyi nang stong pa nyid ma yin /
translated: is not inner and outer emptiness.üîΩThe degeneration of the emptiness of emptiness

original: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de'ang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ma yin /
analyzed: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de'ang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ma yin /
translated: is not the emptiness of emptiness.üîΩThe degeneration of great emptiness

original: chen po stong pa nyid kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de'ang chen po stong pa nyid ma yin /
analyzed: chen po stong pa nyid kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de'ang chen po stong pa nyid ma yin /
translated: is not great emptiness.

original: don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de'ang don dam pa stong pa nyid ma yin /
analyzed: don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de'ang don dam pa stong pa nyid ma yin /
translated: The degeneration of the emptiness of the ultimate is not the emptiness of the ultimate.

original: 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de'ang 'dus byas stong pa nyid ma yin /
analyzed: 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de'ang 'dus byas stong pa nyid ma yin /
translated: The degeneration of the emptiness of the conditioned is not the emptiness of the conditioned.

original: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de'ang 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ma yin /
analyzed: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de'ang 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ma yin /
translated: The degeneration of the emptiness of the unconditioned is not the emptiness of the unconditioned.

original: mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de'ang mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ma yin /üîΩthog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de'ang thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid ma yin /
analyzed: mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de'ang mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ma yin / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de'ang thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid ma yin /
translated: The degeneration of the emptiness of what is beyond extremes is not the emptiness of what is beyond extremes.üîΩThe degeneration of the emptiness of what is limitless is not the emptiness of what is limitless.

original: dor pa med pa stong pa nyid kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de'ang dor ba med pa stong pa nyid ma yin /
analyzed: dor pa med pa stong pa nyid kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de'ang dor ba med pa stong pa nyid ma yin /
translated: The degeneration of the emptiness of what is not to be discarded is not the emptiness of what is not to be discarded.

original: rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de'ang rang bzhin stong pa nyid ma yin /
analyzed: rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de'ang rang bzhin stong pa nyid ma yin /
translated: The degeneration of the emptiness of nature is not the emptiness of nature.

original: chos @286b thams cad stong pa nyid kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de'ang chos thams cad stong pa nyid ma yin /
analyzed: chos @286b thams cad stong pa nyid kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de'ang chos thams cad stong pa nyid ma yin /
translated: The degeneration of the emptiness of all phenomena is not the emptiness of all phenomena.

original: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de'ang rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ma yin /
analyzed: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de'ang rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ma yin /
translated: The degeneration of the emptiness of defining attributes is not the emptiness of defining attributes.

original: mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de'ang mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid ma yin /
analyzed: mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de'ang mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid ma yin /
translated: The degeneration of the emptiness of nonobservation is not the emptiness of nonobservation.

original: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de'ang dngos po med pa stong pa nyid ma yin /
analyzed: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de'ang dngos po med pa stong pa nyid ma yin /
translated: The degeneration of the emptiness of nonthings is not the emptiness of nonthings.

original: ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de'ang ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ma yin /
analyzed: ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de'ang ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ma yin /
translated: The degeneration of the emptiness of essential nature is not the emptiness of essential nature.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de'ang dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ma yin /
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de'ang dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ma yin /
translated: The degeneration of the emptiness that is the essential nature of nonthings is not the emptiness that is the essential nature of nonthings.

original: dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de'ang dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams ma yin /
analyzed: dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de'ang dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams ma yin /
translated: The degeneration of the applications of mindfulness is not the applications of mindfulness.

original: yang dag par spong ba rnams kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de'ang yang dag par spong ba rnams ma yin /
analyzed: yang dag par spong ba rnams kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de'ang yang dag par spong ba rnams ma yin /
translated: The degeneration of the right efforts is not the right efforts.

original: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de'ang rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams ma yin /
analyzed: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de'ang rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams ma yin /
translated: The degeneration of the legs of manifestation is not the legs of manifestation.

original: dbang po rnams kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de'ang dbang po rnams ma yin /
analyzed: dbang po rnams kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de'ang dbang po rnams ma yin /
translated: The degeneration of the faculties is not the faculties.

original: stobs rnams kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de'ang stobs rnams ma yin /
analyzed: stobs rnams kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de'ang stobs rnams ma yin /
translated: The degeneration of the powers is not the powers.

original: byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de'ang byang chub kyi yan lag rnams ma yin /
analyzed: byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de'ang byang chub kyi yan lag rnams ma yin /
translated: The degeneration of the branches of enlightenment is not the branches of enlightenment.

original: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de'ang 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ma yin /
analyzed: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de'ang 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ma yin /
translated: The degeneration of the noble eightfold path is not the noble eightfold path.

original: 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi 'grib @287a *//
analyzed: 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi 'grib @287a *//
translated: The degeneration of the noble truths is not the noble truths.

original: pa gang yin pa de'ang 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams ma yin /
analyzed: pa gang yin pa de'ang 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams ma yin /
translated: That which is the increase of the noble truths is not the noble truths.

original: bsam gtan rnams kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de'ang bsam gtan rnams ma yin /
analyzed: bsam gtan rnams kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de'ang bsam gtan rnams ma yin /
translated: That which is the decrease of the concentrations is not the concentrations.

original: tshad med pa rnams kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de'ang tshad med pa rnams ma yin /
analyzed: tshad med pa rnams kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de'ang tshad med pa rnams ma yin /
translated: That which is the decrease of the immeasurables is not the immeasurables.

original: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de'ang gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ma yin /
analyzed: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de'ang gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ma yin /
translated: That which is the decrease of the formless absorptions is not the formless absorptions.

original: rnam par thar pa rnams kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de'ang rnam par thar pa rnams ma yin /
analyzed: rnam par thar pa rnams kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de'ang rnam par thar pa rnams ma yin /
translated: That which is the decrease of the deliverances is not the deliverances.

original: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de'ang mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ma yin /
analyzed: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de'ang mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ma yin /
translated: That which is the decrease of the meditative stabilizations is not the meditative stabilizations.

original: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de'ang rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa ma yin /
analyzed: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de'ang rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa ma yin /
translated: The degeneration of the emptiness, signlessness, and aspirationlessness gateways to liberation is not the emptiness, signlessness, and aspirationlessness gateways to liberation.

original: mngon par shes pa rnams kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de'ang mngon par shes pa rnams ma yin /
analyzed: mngon par shes pa rnams kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de'ang mngon par shes pa rnams ma yin /
translated: The degeneration of the higher cognitions is not the higher cognitions.

original: ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de'ang ting nge 'dzin rnams ma yin /
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de'ang ting nge 'dzin rnams ma yin /
translated: The degeneration of the meditative stabilizations is not the meditative stabilizations.

original: gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de'ang gzungs kyi sgo rnams ma yin /
analyzed: gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de'ang gzungs kyi sgo rnams ma yin /
translated: The degeneration of the dhƒÅra·πáƒ´ gateways is not the dhƒÅra·πáƒ´ gateways.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de'ang de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams ma yin /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de'ang de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams ma yin /
translated: The degeneration of the tathƒÅgatas‚Äô powers is not the tathƒÅgatas‚Äô powers.

original: mi 'jigs pa rnams kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de'ang mi 'jigs @287b pa rnams ma yin /
analyzed: mi 'jigs pa rnams kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de'ang mi 'jigs @287b pa rnams ma yin /
translated: The degeneration of the fearlessnesses is not the fearlessnesses.

original: so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de'ang so so yang dag par rig pa rnams ma yin /üîΩbyams pa chen po'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de'ang byams pa chen po ma yin /
analyzed: so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de'ang so so yang dag par rig pa rnams ma yin / byams pa chen po'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de'ang byams pa chen po ma yin /
translated: The decrease of the detailed and thorough knowledges is not the detailed and thorough knowledges.üîΩThe decrease of the great love is not the great love.

original: snying rje chen po'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de'ang snying rje chen po ma yin /
analyzed: snying rje chen po'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de'ang snying rje chen po ma yin /
translated: The decrease of the great compassion is not the great compassion.

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de'ang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams ma yin /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de'ang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams ma yin /
translated: The decrease of the distinct attributes of a buddha is not the distinct attributes of a buddha.

original: thams cad shes pa nyid kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de'ang thams cad shes pa nyid ma yin /
analyzed: thams cad shes pa nyid kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de'ang thams cad shes pa nyid ma yin /
translated: The decrease of the knowledge of all aspects is not the knowledge of all aspects.

original: lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de'ang lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid ma yin /
analyzed: lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de'ang lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid ma yin /
translated: The decrease of the knowledge of path aspects is not the knowledge of path aspects.

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de'ang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma yin no //
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de'ang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma yin no //
translated: The decrease of the knowledge of all aspects is not the knowledge of all aspects.

original: smras pa / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor /
analyzed: smras pa / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor /
translated: Subh≈´ti replied, ‚ÄúVenerable ≈öƒÅriputra,

original: ci'i phyir na de skad du /
analyzed: ci'i phyir na de skad du /
translated: why is it that I say

original: gang 'di gzugs zhes bya ba de ni gnyis su med pa'i grangs su byas pa'o //üîΩgang 'di tshor ba zhes bya ba de ni gnyis su med pa'i grangs su byas pa'o //
analyzed: gang 'di gzugs zhes bya ba de ni gnyis su med pa'i grangs su byas pa'o // gang 'di tshor ba zhes bya ba de ni gnyis su med pa'i grangs su byas pa'o //
translated: that ‚Äòthis so-called form is made into an unpaired number,‚ÄôüîΩthat ‚Äòthis so-called feeling is made into an unpaired number,‚Äô

original: gang 'di 'du shes zhes bya ba de ni gnyis su med pa'i grangs su byas pa'o //
analyzed: gang 'di 'du shes zhes bya ba de ni gnyis su med pa'i grangs su byas pa'o //
translated: that ‚Äòthis so-called perception is made into an unpaired number,‚Äô

original: gang 'di 'du byed ces bya ba de ni gnyis su med pa'i grangs su byas pa'o //
analyzed: gang 'di 'du byed ces bya ba de ni gnyis su med pa'i grangs su byas pa'o //
translated: that ‚Äòthis so-called formation is made into an unpaired number,‚Äô

original: gang 'di rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba de ni gnyis su med pa'i grangs su byas pa'o //üîΩgang 'di mig ces bya ba de ni gnyis su med pa'i grangs su byas pa'o //
analyzed: gang 'di rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba de ni gnyis su med pa'i grangs su byas pa'o // gang 'di mig ces bya ba de ni gnyis su med pa'i grangs su byas pa'o //
translated: and that ‚Äòthis so-called consciousness is made into an unpaired number‚Äô?üîΩThat ‚Äòthis so-called eye is made into an unpaired number,‚Äô

original: gang 'di rna ba zhes bya ba de ni gnyis su med pa'i grangs su byas pa'o //
analyzed: gang 'di rna ba zhes bya ba de ni gnyis su med pa'i grangs su byas pa'o //
translated: that ‚Äòthis so-called ear is made into an unpaired number,‚Äô

original: gang 'di sna zhes @288a *//
analyzed: gang 'di sna zhes @288a *//
translated: that ‚Äòthis so-called nose

original: bya ba de ni gnyis su med pa'i grangs su byas pa'o //
analyzed: bya ba de ni gnyis su med pa'i grangs su byas pa'o //
translated: is made into an unpaired number,‚Äô

original: gang 'di lce zhes bya ba de ni gnyis su med pa'i grangs su byas pa'o //
analyzed: gang 'di lce zhes bya ba de ni gnyis su med pa'i grangs su byas pa'o //
translated: This so-called tongue is reckoned as non-dual.

original: gang 'di lus zhes bya ba de ni gnyis su med pa'i grangs su byas pa'o //
analyzed: gang 'di lus zhes bya ba de ni gnyis su med pa'i grangs su byas pa'o //
translated: This so-called body is reckoned as non-dual.

original: gang 'di yid ces bya ba de ni gnyis su med pa'i grangs su byas pa'o //
analyzed: gang 'di yid ces bya ba de ni gnyis su med pa'i grangs su byas pa'o //
translated: This so-called mind is reckoned as non-dual.

original: gang 'di gzugs zhes bya ba de ni gnyis su med pa'i grangs su byas pa'o //
analyzed: gang 'di gzugs zhes bya ba de ni gnyis su med pa'i grangs su byas pa'o //
translated: This so-called form is reckoned as non-dual.

original: gang 'di sgra zhes bya ba de ni gnyis su med pa'i grangs su byas pa'o //üîΩgang 'di dri zhes bya ba de ni gnyis su med pa'i grangs su byas pa'o //
analyzed: gang 'di sgra zhes bya ba de ni gnyis su med pa'i grangs su byas pa'o // gang 'di dri zhes bya ba de ni gnyis su med pa'i grangs su byas pa'o //
translated: This so-called sound is reckoned as non-dual.üîΩThis so-called smell is reckoned as non-dual.

original: gang 'di ro zhes bya ba de ni gnyis su med pa'i grangs su byas pa'o //
analyzed: gang 'di ro zhes bya ba de ni gnyis su med pa'i grangs su byas pa'o //
translated: This so-called taste is reckoned as non-dual.

original: gang 'di reg ces bya ba de ni gnyis su med pa'i grangs su byas pa'o //
analyzed: gang 'di reg ces bya ba de ni gnyis su med pa'i grangs su byas pa'o //
